snippet: Two reporters for Radio France Internationale had been interviewing a leader with a separatist group in Mali’s unstable desert north. Their bodies were found with their throats slit.
abstract: French journalists Ghislaine Dupont and Claude Verlon are kidnapped and killed in unstable northern area of Mali; affiliation of kidnappers is undetermined.

byline.contributor: Scott Sayare contributed reporting from Paris.

lead_paragraph: Two reporters for Radio France Internationale had been interviewing a leader with a separatist group in Mali’s unstable desert north. Their bodies were found with their throats slit.

headline.main: Two French Journalists Are Kidnapped and Killed by Gunmen in Mali
headline.print_headline: Two French Journalists Are Kidnapped and Killed by Gunmen in Mali
